Possibly my favorite steam game. Not a bad game overall. I am only recommending it because of the gameplay, everything else is not good enough. The developers seem like they are really trying to kill the game. The recent updates are really bad. Free to Play CS:GO was the worst thing that could happen on this game, when you think about the number of people that will be cheating. I still have hopes for the game, even though it does not seem like the game is going to become any greater soon.
so really iteresting everybody should try^^
